description:
After things have calmed down, Keigo Magami has moved into the Otogi household. According to Keigo, he`ll transform into Wolf if he sees any "crescent-shaped objects." Wolf gives in to his greed and will sleep and eat all day if he can, and even with his sexual desires… And so, Nico, Morihito, Kanshi, and Keigo remove all crescent-shaped objects to lessen the risk of transformation.
Source: Crunchyroll
